author: crossley
msg: Enable "sections" be empty, i.e. heading but no paragraph.

author: leif
msg: Modify the way BCel generated wrapper classes are created so that they are assigned the same ProtectionDomain as the class they are wrapping.  The lack of a ProtectionDomain was making in impossible to safely use Fortress in a JVM with a SecurityManager.

msg: the command line tool is spamc, so rephrase a bit here

author: quinlan
msg: remove Sys::Syslog because it's in Perl 5.6.1 and later, other tweaks
